A threat actor has now publicly claimed responsibility for the data breach and leaked 2.8 million records on a hacker forum that they claim are of Giant Tiger customers. [...]

尽管使用了条形码，英国仍然充斥着伪造的邮票——为了防止这种情况发生https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/uk-flooded-with-forged-stamps-尽管-using-barcodes-to-prevent-just-that/ Sat, 13 Apr 2024 05:05:00 -0400阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/uk-flooded-with-forged-stamps-尽管-using-barcodes-to-prevent-just-that/ Royal Mail, the British postal and courier service began switching all snail mail stamps to barcoded stamps last year. The purpose of the barcode was to enhance security, deter stamp reuse, and possibly prevent forgeries—which it has failed to do. [...]
